{"id":1171917207,"question_id":3330,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1707621030,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1171917207/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Modify the Matrix","memory":"45.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[][] modifiedMatrix(int[][] matrix) {\n        int m = matrix.length;\n        int n = matrix[0].length;\n        \n        int[][] res = new int[m][n];\n        int[] max = new int[n];\n        \n        int cur = -2;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            cur = -2;\n            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){\n                cur = Math.max(cur, matrix[j][i]);\n            }\n            max[i] = cur;\n        }\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){\n                res[i][j] = matrix[i][j];\n                if(res[i][j] == -1){\n                    res[i][j] = max[j];\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"modify-the-matrix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
